sentences.sContent: The problems confronting the new government were enormous.
sentences.sCn: 新政府面临的难题是巨大的。

sentences.sContent: ...it failed to execute on a strategy to confront it...

remMethod.val: con ＋ front(前面) → 在前面出现 → 迎面遇到

trans.tranCn: 迎面遇到， 遭遇； 勇敢地面对， 正视； 使对质， 使当面对证
trans.tranOther: if a problem, difficulty etc confronts you, it appears and needs to be dealt with
